articles.title: Volodymyr Zelensky calls for creation of 'army of Europe' to face Russian threats - BBC.com
articles.description: The Ukraine president suggests Europe can no longer rely on the US to come to its defence.
articles.content:
Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelensky has called for the creation of an "army of Europe" to guard against Russia as he suggested the US may no longer come to the continent's aid.

articles.author: Karen Gilchrist, Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: NATO's Rutte tells Europe to 'stop complaining' about being sidelined, pledges spending targets increase - CNBC
articles.description: The NATO secretary general confirmed the alliance would reach a new agreement for defense spending targets when members meet in June.
articles.content: NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte on Saturday offered some blunt advice to European members of the military alliance in the face of a more confrontational U.S.: stop complaining and present solutions… [+2407 chars]
